parameter.name: publicIDpattern
parameter.description: PublicID creation pattern for an origin created by RTDD.

parameter.name: activeProfiles
parameter.description: Defines a list of active profiles.

parameter.name: outputPath
parameter.description: Defines the directory used for storing processing input and output files.

parameter.name: manualOrigin
parameter.description: Enables relocation of any manual origin. If false, only event preferred origins are relocated.

parameter.name: wakeupInterval
parameter.description: Specifies the interval in seconds to check/start scheduled operations.

parameter.name: delayTimes
parameter.description: Specifies a list of delay times in seconds relative to event time to trigger the processing. When the first origin of an event arrives this list is used to construct the crontab for this event. Example: "60, 120, 300, 3600"

parameter.name: updateDelay
parameter.description: Specifies the delay in seconds to delay processing if a new authoritative origin arrives for an event.

parameter.name: eventMaxIdleTime
parameter.description: Specifies the maximum allowed idle time of a process before removed. The idle time is calculated if no further processing is scheduled and computes as: [now]-lastRun.

parameter.name: logging
parameter.description: Enables/disables updating of a cron log file. This file will be created at ~/.seiscomp3/log/[appname].sched and contains information about the scheduled events and the processing queue. The file is updated each n seconds, where n = rtdd.cron.wakeupInterval.

struct.description: Defines a regional profile that is used if a prelocation falls inside the configured region. If an origin prelocation falls in multiple profile regions, then the profile with the area center closer to the origin location will be used.

parameter.name: regionType
parameter.description: Type of region: RECTANGLE or CIRCLE

parameter.name: region
parameter.description: Defines the region values. If regionType is RECTANGLE then 4 values (min_lat, min_lon, max_lat, max_lon) are expected. If regionType is CIRCLE then 3 values are expected (lat, lon, radius in km). If region is empty, then it will represent a region that matches any origin.

parameter.name: earthModelID
parameter.description: earthModelID that is stored in the created origin.

parameter.name: methodID
parameter.description: methodID that is stored in the created origin.

parameter.name: stationFile
parameter.description: Path to the stations file to be used for this profile

parameter.name: catalogFile
parameter.description: Path to catalog file to be used for this profile

parameter.name: phaFile
parameter.description: Path to catalog picks file to be used for this profile

parameter.name: controlFile
parameter.description: Control file of the current profile. If not set, the default control file will be used instead.
